name: Reunite (XYLOTRON)
description:
Theme: Lost and Found

Sheila has lost her family in a time storm, 3 years in future to be precise.

Travel the world and time 6 months at a time. 

Get the time travel key in the first level or you'll be stuck in the next winter level forever. Each level is set apart 6 months causing Summer and Winter periodically.

Winter Levels start exactly where you finished in summer level. So, you will need pay attention while travelling the same level back in Winters.

Use WASD/Arrow Keys to move, space to jump and 'F' to fire.

Goodluck!

[IPG Project]
[Goldsmiths, UoL]
